comment: She's very easy. She teaches a programming language, but she's less focused on you learning the language than you learning the ideas behind it, so she'll write you the programs and you just need to input your values. She makes the class very straightforward. Definitely take her for this class.

Fairly easy class and this professor makes it even easier. You have to learn RStudio code for this but its fairly straightforward and you have easy homework to help you practice with it. Very nice lady who is always available outside of class when needed. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Bowen is extremely kind and accessible if you have any questions. Graded by HW and quizzes for each chapter, midterm, and final. Provides all code you need for R and lecture notes, quizzes and exams open note. Extra credit available and honors project for HLE if needed. Super helpful and you learn a lot if you follow along!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment:
Course revolved around using the R programming language, but you are given all of the code needed to solve the questions. Homework was done on ALEKS. There is a final project where you analyze a data set of your choice.
Very kind professor, does not hesitate to assist you if you have questions about the material.
Very easy class that you learn a lot in. There is a final project where you show what you've learned in R-studio. She is very nice and willing to help in any way.

The course's pace was very slow, so I stopped attending class, however, the course was still very easy. The notes that she puts out are very easy to learn from. You can do all of the work online and do just fine.

Very easy class. Everything is open book and open note. No required participation and you are given guided notes to learn from. You are given the code needed to solve the problems. Kind teacher who is willing to move due dates for you.

Great Prof and simple material. The course isn't hard but I found that I did have to apply myself. She encourages us to utilize her office hours outside of class. She has multiple e.c oppor. to boost your test average. She is happy to answer any question and really lays out her class content to make it easy. classes were recorded.
One the best profossor at ksu, supper nice and caring!!
Wonderful time in her course.
Provides wonderful resources for her students. Very knowledgeable on the subject and shares that knowledge well. Very caring and understanding.
Easy class! All tests, quizzes,and homeworks are online

She's the best professor for Stats. Extremely caring: I had a rough semester and she worked with me. Easy to talk to, and pretty good at explaining major concepts. Chill lectures, homeworks due on Sunday, and the tests announced weeks in advance. Tests look like classwork. If you need Stats 2332, take Mrs. Eldridge. You won't regret it.

Super caring professor and super responsive to emails and in class. She is always open to questions and provides lots of practice and feedback. Attendance could only help your grade, not hurt it. Super patient for students since a lot of us had never used RStudio before and lots of homework(ALEKS)  to help with practice.

I had Prof. Eldridge for STAT 2332. She was great. She had clear expectations of what the grading criteria are and how to complete assignments. She communicates efficiently and effectively. Attendance isn't mandatory, but coming to class is important for learning code. She is very lenient on grading and is always willing to assist. Take this class!

Great professor. Personally, I don't like or appreciate Stat classes, so this one felt no different to me, but Eldridge made it bearable. She communicates well and is willing to work with you before, after, or outside of class time. For a class like this, she is certainly the best choice.
She has been my Best Math Professor Ever!!!!
Great Professor. Caring, and always there to help you.

She is does not assign a ton of homework, but will let you turn it in late for ten percent less credit. She always goes over homework problems in class and will answer any question you have. If you get an A before the final she will not make you take it. Very thoughtful and easy to reach. I would definitely recommend her for Stats.

The professor is organized and her lessons are not mandatory, but highly recommended. A little practice in this class will go a long way in understanding the material. She gives good feedback and will help anyone who needs help understanding any of the topics.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I think Professor Eldridge is my favorite professor in college so far and I hate math. Please take her, she is so incredibly helpful and kind; she makes learning stat so easy. Attendance is optional but I really recommend showing up because the material does get difficult.

Professor Eldridge does not require attendance but it is heavily advised! She gives amazing lectures and explains each problem of you have any questions. She post recordings of each lecture on Microsoft teams! She is extremely helpful with any questions you may have and will even help you with homework! I would definitely recommend her to everyone!

She is kind and understanding and teaches the material well. Just make sure to come to class so that you know what tests and quizzes are coming up, because one time I skipped a class where she said when a test would be. I had to take a test from memory next class. Still got a 100+ though! Usually she puts the due dates for things on D2L.

Great professor who does everything to help you succeed in the class. Going to class is not mandatory but helps in grasping the material. It is a math class so doing the hw problems helps prepare for the test but there's not a ridiculous amount of work in this class. 3 easy in class exams that are usually curved.

By far my favorite professor! She is super funny and kind and cares about her students. She is super helpful on all the material and makes sure everyone is on the same page before moving on. Her class is not workload heavy. Just a couple of assignments here and there. I highly recommend taking her

Her lectures and notes were laid out so clearly and she was always so available to help out where she could. All the quizzes and tests were so easy because she showed us how to do everything so thoroughly. 4 tests including the final that you can exempt, a few quizzes, and homework for each chapter. Overall such an amazing professor!!

Professor Eldridge is an awesome statistics teacher. Her lecture notes/videos are very helpful and clear, she uploads them to D2L, and she always tries to emphasize asking for help if you need it. The homework she assigns is also helpful and is done online. I highly recommend her. I would also suggest you get the required calculator for this class.
